home.description: 3D Artist and Motion Designer based in Paris, I craft precisely designed worlds with polished and impactful visuals for brands, agencies, and artists.
home.title: 3D ARTIST AND MOTION DESIGNER

about.title: 3D ARTIST AND MOTION DESIGNER
about.description: Creator of Visual Universes in 3D & Motion Design With over 4 years of experience, I design immersive and impactful visual experiences for brands, agencies, and artists. My approach combines strong artistic direction, visual storytelling, and technical mastery to bring unique universes to life

motionDesign.title: 3D & 2D Motion Design
motionDesign.description: Crafting dynamic and aesthetically pleasing animations to enhance your projects.

artDirection.title: Art Direction
artDirection.description: Developing coherent and impactful visual concepts aligned with your brand identity.

editingCompositing.title: Editing & Compositing
editingCompositing.description: Assembling and refining videos for a professional and harmonious result.

aurum-nova.title: AURUM NOVA
aurum-nova.description: A full 3D commercial imagined for a fictional sustainable jewelry brand. Visual identity, art direction, and sound design were all crafted to reflect both prestige and ecological commitment.
aurum-nova.role: Concept, art direction, 3D, sound – full solo production

dune.title: DUNE – The Fremen Ambush
dune.description: A personal 3D short film recreating the unique aesthetic of Dune. A micro-story with immersive storytelling centered around a tactical ambush.

eco-cleaner.title: ECOCLEANER
eco-cleaner.description: 3D commercial for a high-end robotic vacuum. A sleek, minimalistic universe and fluid transitions to emphasize innovation and eco-consciousness.

family-tech-drive.title: FAMILY TECH DRIVE
family-tech-drive.description: 3D ad made in a duo, highlighting onboard technology and family safety in vehicles. A mix of storytelling and product showcasing.

paris-music-2024.title: PARIS – Fête de la Musique 2024
paris-music-2024.description: A 2-week short film built in Unreal Engine 5. The story follows a character exploring Paris during the Fête de la Musique, told through dynamic sequences and atmospheric cinematography.

fooh.title: FOOH – Fake Out Of Home
fooh.description: 3D simulation projects seamlessly integrated into real-world environments, showcasing the visual power of fictional ad campaigns in public spaces. From full conceptual universe creation to core 3D assets for brands like Gérard Darel: modeling, texturing, particles and compositing for hyper-realistic staging.

karmin-corp-lec-reveal.title: KARMINE CORP – LEC Reveal
karmin-corp-lec-reveal.description: Epic 3D video celebrating Karmine Corp's entry into the LEC. A monumental, trophy-focused staging meant to capture the hype and emotion of the moment.

limova-movali.title: LIMOVA & MOVALI – Kaitonom.IA
limova-movali.description: 2D and 3D motion design work for Kaitonom.IA, a smart assistant solution aimed at professionals and associations. Designed to explain key features with clarity and visual appeal.

spiderman-timefreeze.title: SPIDERMAN – Time Freeze
spiderman-timefreeze.description: 3D short film inspired by the Deadpool opening sequence. Time is frozen mid-action in a tense, highly detailed urban scene, where every element contributes to a sense of cinematic suspension.

lyner.title: LYNER
lyner.description: 3D commercial made at Blackmotion for Lyner, a dental service offering custom aligners and full support. A clean and bright visual treatment to convey trust, simplicity and modernity.

mr-help.title: MR. HELP
mr-help.description: A series of 3D videos for Mr. Help, a company specializing in furniture and A/C installations. Each piece highlights the ease of use, service guarantees and the value of the 'Serenity Pack'.

dals.title: DANCING WITH THE STARS
dals.description: Creation of 3D-mapped stage visuals for the French TV show Danse avec les Stars (TF1), working with talents like Lénie, Jungeli, Claude Dartois, Florent Manaudou and Adil Rami. Each tableau was designed to enhance the choreography with bespoke visuals and real-time projection mapping.
dals.role: Design and creation of 3D stage visuals
dals.client: Blackmotion / Client: TF1 – Danse avec les Stars

yassencore.title: YASSENCORE – Twitch Waiting Screen
yassencore.description: A tailor-made waiting screen for Twitch streamer YassEncore, reflecting his favorite universes: Breaking Bad, Dragon Ball, football... Designed to kick off streams with personality and atmosphere.

pixel-break.title: PIXEL BREAK
pixel-break.description: 3D short film made in collaboration with Mario Sougoumarin. Starting from a Space Invader mosaic on a wall, the viewer is pulled into a hidden digital world where the pixel aliens prepare their uprising. A mix of photoreal urban textures and retro pixel aesthetics.

trybz.title: TRYBZ
trybz.description: Stand design for a beverage brand, TRYBZ, showcased at Adil Rami's birthday event
